Set the initial values from a vector of model states

Source: R/aquatic-interface.R
update_Linits.Rd

This method dispatches on the class of pars$Lpar.

Usage

update_Linits(pars, y0, s)

Arguments

pars

an xds object

y0

a vector of variable values from a simulation

s

the species index

Value

an xds object
